meanings.definition: The bony prominence of the ulna at the elbow.
meanings.sent1: When I accidentally hit my olecranon on the table, it hurt a lot.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the patient's olecranon to check for any fractures.
meanings.sent3: The olecranon decided to take a break from being the center of attention.
meanings.sent4: Her sharp wit was like the olecranon of the conversation, always standing out.
meanings.sent5: The olecranon, like a small mountain on his elbow, reminded him of his strength.

meanings.definition: A process of the ulna projecting behind the elbow joint.
meanings.sent1: He felt a sharp pain in his olecranon when he extended his arm.
meanings.sent2: The olecranon provides stability to the elbow joint during movement.
meanings.sent3: The olecranon was feeling rebellious and refused to bend with the arm.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the olecranon, always pushing her forward.
meanings.sent5: The olecranon, a small ledge on his elbow, guided his actions like a compass.
